thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 20 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-HSBC Holdings Reduces Number Of Board Committees From Seven To Five

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-HSBC Holdings Reduces Number Of Board Committees From Seven To Five

organizations.name: brief-hsbc holdings reduces number of board committees from seven to five

text:
April 20 (Reuters) - HSBC Holdings Plc:
* REDUCING NUMBER OF BOARD COMMITTEES FROM SEVEN TO FIVE * RESPONSIBILITIES OF CONDUCT AND VALUES COMMITTEE AND PHILANTHROPIC AND COMMUNITY INVESTMENT OVERSIGHT COMMITTEE WILL BE REASSIGNED
* WE INTEND TO MAINTAIN ANNUAL DIVIDEND AT CURRENT LEVEL FOR FORESEEABLE FUTURE
* AFTER PROVISION OF CAPITAL TO SUPPORT GROWTH OF BUSINESS AND MAINTAINING OUR DIVIDEND, WE WILL THEN CONSIDER SHARE BUY-BACKS, SUBJECT TO REGULATORY APPROVAL
* WILL UPDATE SHAREHOLDERS ON HOW WE INTEND TO EVOLVE STRATEGY AT OR BEFORE OUR HALF-YEAR RESULTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
